nodes.text: A hyperlane in the Outer Rim Territories ran into the Corporate Sector via the Lo'Uran system and then passed through the Ninn system before ending at the Lythos system. The Lythos star system was also on the Hydian Way and Authority Guardian Corridor, meaning the system acted as a junction between the three hyperlanes.

The hyperlane first appeared in the sourcebook The Essential Atlas which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released in 2009. The lane was depicted in a map of the Corporate Sector but not named or mentioned in any text. The lane continued off the edge of the map but where it continues to is not shown anywhere else in the book.
